mapper.insert: insert into t_sjqita (sjqitaId, sjqitaName, sjqitaMark, sjqitaMark1, sjqitaMark2, sjqitaPhone, sjqitaDizhi, sjqitaDate, sjqitaDate1, sjqitaType, sjqitaType1, sjqitaDouble, sjqitaDouble1) values (#{sjqitaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sjqitaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjqitaMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjqitaMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjqitaMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjqitaPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjqitaDizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjqitaDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sjqitaDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sjqitaType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sjqitaType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sjqitaDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sjqitaDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update t_sjqita set sjqitaName = #{sjqitaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjqitaMark = #{sjqitaMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjqitaMark1 = #{sjqitaMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjqitaMark2 = #{sjqitaMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjqitaPhone = #{sjqitaPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjqitaDizhi = #{sjqitaDizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjqitaDate = #{sjqitaDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sjqitaDate1 = #{sjqitaDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sjqitaType = #{sjqitaType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sjqitaType1 = #{sjqitaType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sjqitaDouble = #{sjqitaDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sjqitaDouble1 = #{sjqitaDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where sjqitaId = #{sjqitaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sjqitaId, sjqitaName, sjqitaMark, sjqitaMark1, sjqitaMark2, sjqitaPhone, sjqitaDizhi, sjqitaDate, sjqitaDate1, sjqitaType, sjqitaType1, sjqitaDouble, sjqitaDouble1 from t_sjqita where sjqitaId = #{sjqitaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
